page.title: 19Life at Bolingy.
page.content: In our family there are three of us,my mother,my father and myself.We live in a four bedroomed bungalow with a self contained annex attached to it.We have an acre of garden with a river running throught it.We grow all our own vegetables and soft fruit.We have two pear trees as well.My dad works as a dentist in Truro.Our main activity is sailing and we go out most weekends.We have two boats and two dinghies.I also enjoy playing musical instruments, swimming and riding.My mothers hobbies include tennis and badminton.During the Summer we holiday in Wales where we go sailing with a number of friends.We have been doing this for years now.We also windsurf and fish in the sea.Winter evenings are another favourite time when we sit round our open fire and roast chestnuts.
